name: Casting Treatment Analysis
query:
select 
    ct.name AS 'ID', 
    ct.treatment_date AS 'Treatment Date', 
    ct.casting_treatment AS 'Casting Treatment', 
    #sum_of_total_quantity AS 'Total Quantity', 
    #sum_of_total_weight AS 'Total Weight', 
    ct.contractor AS 'Contractor ID', 
    ct.contractor_name AS 'Contractor Name',
    pc.item_code AS 'Item Code',
    pc.item_name AS 'Item Name',
    SUM(pc.quantity) AS 'Quantity',
    SUM(pc.weight) AS 'Weight:Float:90',
    pc.source_warehouse AS 'Source Warehouse',
    pc.target_warehouse AS 'Target Warehouse',
    ct.company AS 'Company'
FROM 
    `tabCasting Treatment`ct
LEFT JOIN
     `tabCasting Treatment Pattern Casting Item` pc ON ct.name = pc.parent
WHERE
    ct.docstatus = '1'
    AND treatment_date BETWEEN %(from_date)s AND %(to_date)s
    AND ct.company = %(company)s
GROUP BY
    ct.name,
    ct.treatment_date,
    ct.casting_treatment , 
    ct.contractor , 
    ct.contractor_name,
    pc.item_code,
    pc.item_name,
    pc.source_warehouse,
    pc.target_warehouse,
    ct.company
